div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1109 Lantekhi raion, junction of the Nakra and Inguri Rivers, Georgia, 1908 Burial: 3rd cent. B.C. or later Contents: c. 100 AV. Pot hoard Alexander III: 1 st. Disposition: dispersed Pakhomov V, 1319 Possibly from the same hd. as nos. mo and/or 1108 Lantekhi is sometimes spelled Lentekhi
